tags: my family has guests over and my food is in the kitchen!!!
i can't go to the kitchen without being seen goD
regretting i didn't go to drink my weight in orange juice right about now
summary: jirou, texting kaminari: bro where are you the talk with aizawa started 5 mins ago we’re in the common room kaminari, texting...
body:
jirou, texting kaminari: bro where are you the talk with aizawa started 5 mins ago we’re in the common room

kaminari, texting jirou back, 3 mins later: hey do you think i can sneak to the kitchen without being seen and come back

summary: May I please have some cute and fluffy Bakugo and his S/O cuddling? Like, their head are resting on his chest while they just...
question: May I please have some cute and fluffy Bakugo and his S/O cuddling? Like, their head are resting on his chest while they just revel in each other's presence.
answer:
Bakugo Katsuki:

  • Whoever said this Rowdy Ruff Boy isn’t into cuddling is a damn liar. Even though he’d probably never flt out admit it, Bakugo likes cuddling with you. When he has you in his arms, it’s like all his worries and stress melt away.
  • He likes to have you on his chest when cuddling, his arms wrapped around you and holding you close. Whether or not you want to lay on your back or on your stomach is up to you, either way is perfectly fine with him. Cuddling this way just makes him feel so relaxed, and knowing that you are safe here and secure in his arms makes him feel pretty damn good.
  • However, a deeper reason he likes cuddling like this is because he feels like in this position, he is comforting you, being there for you, supporting you, and loving you, making you feel needed and loved and that you are doing the same to him. You’re both being vulnerable with one another, letting the other find comfort in your embrace, feeling each other’s heart beats and helping one another unwind.
  • If you run your fingers through his hair when you both cuddle like this, chances are that he is going to doze off. No matter what time it is or how many times you playfully warn him not to fall asleep, he still ends up taking a little nap under you. Seeing him sleeping you peacefully with his arms still wrapped securely around you makes you so warm. Sometimes he’ll even whisper your name in his sleep and it is the absolute cutest thing ever. Just don’t take any pictures if you have your ringer on since it’ll wake him up and he’ll put up a fuss about you taking pictures of him.
  • He gives you the sweetest and most heartfelt kisses when you are both cuddling. He’ll only ever kiss you once during each session but it’s more than enough to make you feel so incredibly loved. It’ll happen at a random time, completely catching you off guard each and every single time he does it. He’ll kiss your cheek, your hand, your nose, your lips, whatever he is in the mood for, but the kiss will always be a few seconds long and sweet. Followed by every kiss, he’ll cup your face or stroke your hair just to give you an added bit of affection from him.
  • On the other hand, the number of kisses you can give him when cuddling is infinite. He will accept every kiss you give him with a small grunt and a sprinkle of red on his cheeks. If your kisses - or any other form of affection really - becomes too much for him, he’ll close his eyes and hide his face in your hair or neck. He never does it for long, though, just long enough to calm his heart and ease the redness of his cheeks.
  • Every once in a while, the Bakusquad will pop in on you guys cuddling and will join in. They all take their assigned spots (Kirishima behind Bakugo, Mina sandwiched between Kaminari and Kirihima with Sero laying on both Kamianri and Mina). It’s a tight fit, but it’s still rather comfortable being surrounded by your friends, enjoying one another’s presence with no words being spoken…until Kaminari remembers a joke he heard from weeks ago that makes everyone groan.

Wanna see some other shit I’ve written?

blog.name: ao3feed-shigadabi
blog.title: AO3 feed for Shigaraki Tomura x Dabi
blog.description: Using an IFTTT server to post the feed here.

summary: Dance with the devil
title: Dance with the devil
body:
by Slendergirl

Life isn’t perfect, it isn’t and it never will be. Katsuki knows that too well. The world is a cruel place, especially when all you want to be is the hero of your own story. (First chapter is an explicit rape scene it won’t be necessary to the rest of the story but might help see through his eyes)

Words: 4396, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Rape/Non-Con, Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Aizawa Shouta, Shigaraki Tomura, Todoroki Toya, Dabi, and many others
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic
  • Additional Tags: There will be other more minor ships, Kiribaku is the main one, lots of triggers, this is a ride, Lots of Angst, Rape, Torture, self blame for rape, Victim Blaming, Mpreg, Abortion, Abuse, Katsuki just needs help, First Person, Dont worry Eijiro will help him, Bakugo Katsuki has abusive parents, don’t try to change my mind, Rape Recovery, Hurt/Comfort, Self Harm, Suicidal Thoughts, Pain, Healing, first chapter is a rape scene, But can be skipped once the other ones are out, but if you really want to see what he’s going through, read it


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/18758350

  • Additional Tags: There will be other more minor ships, Kiribaku is the main one, lots of triggers, this is a ride, Lots of Angst, Rape, Torture, self blame for rape, Victim Blaming, Mpreg, Abortion, Abuse, Katsuki just needs help, First Person, Dont worry Eijiro will help him, Bakugo Katsuki has abusive parents, don’t try to change my mind, Rape Recovery, Hurt/Comfort, Self Harm, Suicidal Thoughts, Pain, Healing, first chapter is a rape scene, But can be skipped once the other ones are out, but if you really want to see what he’s going through, read it

summary: Day 2 attempt of my previous post lol I drew with a pencil and colored it with some auto desk sketch on my phone hehe it got...
body:
Day 2 attempt of my previous post lol I drew with a pencil and colored it with some auto desk sketch on my phone hehe it got better except maybe kaminari’s hair lol

____

A bit about the That thing called tadhana AU hehe I tweaked it a bit

Kaminari and Shinsou were classmates during Highschool and liked each other but neither got to confess. After graduating, they lost touch until they met again in an airport in (leaving) Rome.

Kami was fresh out of an 8 Yr relationship bec his ex cheated on him. After meeting Shinsou at the airport, they went on a journey to help Kami move on or revive their old feelings?? Who knows hahaha

blog.name: minaashidoismywife
blog.title: Ashido For President
blog.description: My Hero Academia sideblog. Y'all can call me S or Syd. She/Her pronouns. I'll be posting about general bnha stuff, ships, headcanons, and occasionally my shitty writing. I occasionally follow back on my main blog (disaster-lesbian-1300). My Ao3 is under the same name as this blog. SWERFs and TERFs not allowed. No discourse allowed. This is a happy and accepting blog, my dudes.

tags: lets see if this sideblog fails as miserably as my others
ill warn anyone who follows this blog that im a disaster of a human
all of my writing is done between 1 and 5 in the morning
summary: So, I'm pretty new to the BNHA fanbase.
body:
So, I’m pretty new to the BNHA fanbase.

I’ve been watching the anime for awhile (I haven’t read the manga because I’m a broke bitch), but just now got around to making a blog for it. I’ll be reblogging fanart and shit like that. I also think I might post some headcanons and some of my writing?

Ships that will be on this blog are erasermic, tododeku, kiribaku, shinkami, miritama, and any other ship I find myself enjoying.

I’m currently writing a short kiribaku series that I’ll probably post eventually. It’s a cute little series of them writing things about each other.

Also I don’t understand how queues work so y'all will have to deal with my ridiculous sporadic blogging that usually takes place around 2 am. Sorry.

Anyway, that’s it. I hope people enjoy my garbage writing style.

summary:
just some league of villains headcanons-
> they battle for kurogiri’s spaghetti. it tastes so amazing. as soon as he yells that...
body:
just some league of villains headcanons-

> they battle for kurogiri’s spaghetti. it tastes so amazing. as soon as he yells that it’s ready, they speed towards the kitchen like it’s the apocalypse and they were being chased by zombies. once shigaraki’s bowl full of spaghetti got knocked over and he nearly decayed them.

> despite toga being younger than all of them and being yandere, she is the mom of the house. she will not hesitate to beat your ass if you’re pissing her off deliberately. 

> shigaraki throws the biggest tantrums known to mankind. he’s like a 5-year-old; if he doesn’t get what he wants, he screams. it pisses dabi off so they have to lock him in a quirkproof and soundproof room. toga was nominated to check the room every 20 minutes to see if he’s calm. when he acts like a 5-year-old, they treat him like one since he deserves it. dabi ironically offered him a pacifier and he took it. that’s what calms him down now. (i think i may have accidentally created a little!shigaraki.)

> shigaraki eventually starts using it whenever he feels like and the others don’t question it. he uses it to sleep and often has it on a morning while they’re all having breakfast.

> dabi is clingy as fuck. not toga clingy but touch starved clingy. he constantly wants cuddles but occasionally gets them from tomura after he’s had a tantrum.

> shigaraki often wears quirkproof gloves that were made for him. he can cuddle with much more safety now.

> you just know bakugou was confused as fuck when he saw all this went down. the screaming, the fights over spaghetti, the cuddles. at one point, toga just said to him “Don’t ask…”. he stills wonders about it to this day.

> with the theory of dabi being todoroki’s brother, he would be slightly scared around kettles, he hates it when the others make tea, coffee or any kind of hot beverage. they ask him about it but he denies answering and eventually goes off of the subject.

> instead of attacking people, sometimes they just have lazy days. in pajamas, watching tv and cereal for dinner. tomura hasn’t got his hand on. toga hasn’t done her hair or makeup. they all look strange but hey, it’s a lazy day.

> kurogiri acts like he hates shigaraki but really he cares about him.

> toga is definitely a memer, they all hate it but eventually, tomura goes on her side.

> all in all, they’re just one big family who likes cuddles and spaghetti.

that’s all i’ve got homies. later.

if you’ve got any other league of villains headcanons, feel free to comment and add them it, crediting you.
